items.title: Before updating to 5.5.5!
items.content: Updating to 5.5.5 will have minor layout changes like a new gutter approach for .wp-site-blocks container instead of core/columns block padding. You will need to edit any customized templates to remove the custom padding/padding classes.

items.title: Where is the comments template?
items.content: Please install Gutenberg Plugin - comments related blocks did not landed in WP 5.9 yet. If you are not using comments you can remove them from single.html template.
